metadata.description: Hellish landscapes, brutal violence and arcane elder Gods collide in this brand new comic collection based on Bethesda’s cult first-person shooter videogame franchise!n“Captures the epic spirit of Quake!” – The Pullboxn“The blood and monsters are damn nice… Amazing artwork!” – We the Nerdy!n“Fast, big, explosive and cool!” – Game4Me
metadata.name: Quake Champions
